name: Project Cabin
description: Explore this mysterious cabin and solve how to escape from that place.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: i3 4150 - AMD A8 7600 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 750 ti - AMD R7 265 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: i5 6400 - AMD FX 8370 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 960 - AMD R9 380 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
